pages.text: $(b)New Crops$() add variety to your farming! Grow $(violet)Strawberries$() and $(violet)Lemons$() to create delicious tarts.

pages.title: Growing Crops
pages.text: $(b)Strawberries$()$(br)Plant strawberry seeds on farmland. Break mature plants for strawberries and more seeds.$(br2)$(b)Lemons$()$(br)Plant lemon seeds on farmland. Break mature plants for lemons and more seeds.
Craft $(violet)Tart Crust$() from wheat as the base for tarts.
Combine lemon, sugar, and tart crust for $(violet)Unbaked Lemon Tart$().
Bake in a furnace to create $(violet)Lemon Tart$()! Restores hunger and saturation.
Combine strawberry, sugar, and tart crust for $(violet)Unbaked Strawberry Tart$().
Bake in a furnace to create $(violet)Strawberry Tart$()! Restores hunger and saturation.
